title: The Flame of Life
description: The world of Arkenfall is in peril as the Flame of Life begins to fade. A young adventurer must embark on a journey to save it.

chapters.title: The Call to Adventure
chapters.description: The protagonist starts in a small village. The elder reveals a prophecy.

quests.title: Gather Supplies
quests.description: Collect supplies from the villagers to prepare for the journey.

chapters.title: Into the Wild
chapters.description: The adventurer ventures into the forest, encountering challenges and choices.

quests.title: Defeat the Forest Beast
quests.description: A giant beast is blocking the path. Defeat it to proceed.

quests.title: Help the Lost Traveler
quests.description: Assist a lost traveler to find their way out of the forest.
